channel.title: Liam's mike rs web Edit - Liams Edit 1.0
channel.description:
i have been editing mike rs web for 4 days now,
i edited Version 5.0 with the forums included.
I fixed a few bugs in the forums and alot of bugs on the mainpage.
Also i changed it around a little bit.
mike still has credits but remember to give me a little.
[B]What i done?[/B]
Generally i fixed alot of bugs,Including the forum bugs that might of got onto your nerves.
Also the navigation bars have been changed and made to look better.
[B]Changes :[/B]
Well here is the changes.
[code]
-Play now On the navigation bar now says Silab client
-Main now On the navigation bar now says Community
-Forums On the navigation bar now says Webclient Just incase you have a webclient but if you dont then Pm me ill change it for you.
-Login now says In
-Log out now says Out
-Admin Cp if your admin you will see now it says Admin Controll.
-Community Naviagtion bar now drops down and says Forums,Staff list and highscores and if you dont have highscores Pm me.
[/code]
[B]Server Info[/B]
The server info is bugged because i am creating a new one for Liams Edit Version 2.
It will have alot more information that you need for people to view it.
[B]Bug Fixes :[/B]
Most of the bug fixes was with the Themes a few missing parts,but the biggest bug was the forums whilst posting.sometimes some text dosent show up.
But now it does and all fixed.
[B]Download :[/B] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?sharekey=5a1b1e4b03e8fd4a0dec85adfe0a530ae04e75f6e8ebb871]http://www.mediafire.com/?sharekey=5a1b1e4b03e8fd4a0dec85adfe0a530ae04e75f6e8ebb871[/url]
i am uploading pictures and videos.
[B]IMPORTANT[/B]
To change the text at the side that is updates and stuff go to vars.php that is at the bottom of the files.
And to change the navigation were it says webclient if you want it off ect. go to Links.php
You can edit or take them away there, [b] Pictures :[/b]
[IMG]http://i488.photobucket.com/albums/rr242/3skillzzzzz/01.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i488.photobucket.com/albums/rr242/3skillzzzzz/02.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i488.photobucket.com/albums/rr242/3skillzzzzz/03.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i488.photobucket.com/albums/rr242/3skillzzzzz/04.jpg[/img]

item.title: Liam's mike rs web Edit - Liams Edit 1.0
item.dc:creator: @liamlod2008 liamlod2008
item.description:
@liamlod2008 wrote:

ok, sorry 'rich,[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 27, 2009, 05:47:19 am[/size][hr]Guys,im releasing a new one soon,Full screenshots page,Highscores page you just need to change the configuration.

More features -

-Optional webclient
-Members and free buttons (Change them Links.php)
-World list if you have a webclient
-Status page (NEW)

and more…

Read full topic
